x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Many organizations want to encourage employee volunteering as part of their CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) but they often face key challenges:
Employees don’t know where to find verified volunteering opportunities that match their skills, interests, and location.
HR or CSR teams manually coordinate with NGOs, leading to delays in finding right Opportunities
There is no centralized platform to bring together NGOs and CSR teams
